content.prompt: Jane Goodall lived among wild chimpanzees intermittently for decades, studying their social and family systems while keeping her interaction with the chimpanzees to a minimum. Her research method can most accurately be described as

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
